The operators conference in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil was a success
Led by Rafael Azevedo, our Customer Support Manager for the Central and South America, OEMs, operators, dealers, channel partners, pilots, and technicians from all over Brazil had the opportunity to meet with Honeywell support representatives and learn about the latest product updates and services. Topics engaged throughout the event included:
- Engine and Avionics updates - How to get support from Honeywell - Products (RMU upgrades) and Services (GoDirect, MSP, HAPP and MPP) - Cabin Connectivity JetWave and Ka Band - Connectivity Services (GoDirect, Datalink and Flight Data Services)
If you couldn’t attend this Operators Conference, Honeywell will be hosting nine more regional conferences this year.
- July 18, Orange County, CA - July 18, Minneapolis, MN - July 30, Bogota, Colombia - Aug 1, Houston, TX - Aug 12, São Paulo, Brazil - Aug 14, Cleveland, OH - Sep 25, Santiago, Chile - Sep 25, Toluca, Mexico - Nov 5, Scottsdale, AZ
We hope you'll join us to learn more about the products, services and technical information that are critical to your flight department. Register. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2019/january/2019-operator-conferences]]>
